alert.note: Alert for Green; Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:02AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lafayette, western Green and southeastern Iowa Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 202 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Council Hill, or 8 miles northeast of Galena, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Darlington, New Glarus, Shullsburg, Benton, Argyle, Blanchardville, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Waldwick, Fayette, Lamont, Browntown, Gratiot, Calamine, Lead Mine, Jordan Center, Yellowstone Lake St Park, and Woodford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
